GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
sched, cpuset: Fix dl_cpu_busy() panic due to empty cs->cpus_allowed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 147f66d22f58712dce7ccdd6a1f6cb3ee8042df4, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit 7f51412a415d87ea8598d14722fb31e4f5701257. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: sched, cpuset: Fix dl_cpu_busy() panic due to empty cs->cpus_allowed
